attributes.action: Push a debate on the 'Walk away from the Eu instead of invocation of article 50
attributes.background: Recent disclosure by a European Lawyer has broached the fact that the UK doesn't have to invoke article 50, but can simply just walk away!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
